mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, CODE_CFC_SYS_ID, CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_CD, RQST_DCD, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, CRG_USER_NM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert:
insert /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.insertSelective */ into WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO,
CODE_CFC_SYS_ID,
CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM,
CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM,
CODE_CFC_SYS_CD,
RQST_DCD,
VRF_CD,

OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

mapper.update:
update /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS
CODE_CFC_SYS_ID = #{codeCfcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = #{codeCfcSysLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM = #{codeCfcSysPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = #{codeCfcSysCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM = #{codeCfcSysFrm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_NM = #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
--코드분류체계 테이블 요청서 리스트 조회 SELECT /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.selectCodeCfcSysListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID, A.CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM, A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM, A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD, A.RQST_DCD, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.CRG_USER_NM, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS A SET A.REG_TYP_CD = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID ) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS B WHERE B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: , CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_PNM, CODE_CFC_SYS_CD, CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM, CRG_USER_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS A SET (CODE_CFC_SYS_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID AS CODE_CFC_SYS_ID , IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS B WHERE B.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD --AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} --AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS B WHERE B.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD )
mapper.delete:
--WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD
)
mapper.insert:
--WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.insertWAM */ INTO WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS SELECT CODE_CFC_SYS_ID
FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
mapper.update: --WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_CODE_CFC_SYS A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND B.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD ) AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert:
--WAH이력 적재... INSERT /* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_CODE_CFC_SYS SELECT A.CODE_CFC_SYS_ID AS CODE_CFC_SYS_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM
FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'

/* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.checkNotExistCcs */
--검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 코드분류체계 미존재(CCS03) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_CODE_CFC_SYS D WHERE A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.checkDupCcs */
--검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복(CCS04) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO)

/* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.checkRequestCcs */
--검증쿼리 : 요청중인 코드분류체계 (CCS01) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_CD AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_LNM AND A.CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM = D.CODE_CFC_SYS_FRM AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )

/* WaqCodeCfcSysMapper.checkItemErr */
--검증쿼리 : 항목 오류가 있을 경우 체크 (CCS99) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_CODE_CFC_SYS_ITEM D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS E WHERE D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO AND E.VRF_DTL_CD != 'CCS00' ) )
